text:
Reddit 
Chicago Open Air returns to Toyota Park in Bridgeview, Illinois between July 14th and 16th. This yearâ€™s lineup boasts Ozzy Osbourne, KISS, and Korn as headliners. Other notable acts include Slayer, Megadeth, Lamb of God, Meshuggah, Stone Sour, Clutch, The Dillinger Escape Plan, Body Count, Pig Destroyer, Dragonforce, and Code Orange, among others. 
Tickets to the festival go on sale Friday, January 20th at Noon CT. Artists
